page.title: 06TRAFFIC IN EAST LONDON
page.content: A busy road in our area in east London is Whalebone Lane.A survey was done to find out exactly how heavy the traffic is.We found that in one hour a total of 5OO cars,229 articulated lorries and 214 vans passed along the road.The total,including bicycles and motorcycles was 1OO3. Although the area off Whalebone Lane is mainly residential,the traffic is heavy because the road carries traffic to factories off Whalebone Lane on Selinas Lane Industrial Estate.Whalebone Lane is also a link road for journeys towards central London to the west and a more direct route to the Ford Motor Company works in Dagenham to the south.
